data.text: Wuoda, kik wiyi wil kod puonjna
nimar gibiro miyo ngimani dhi maber midag higni mangʼeny
Kik iwe hera kod adiera weyi;
Eka iniyud ngʼwono kod nying maber
Gen kuom Jehova Nyasaye gi chunyi duto,
ket yoreni duto kuome
Kik ibed mariek e pachi iwuon
Tim ma kamano nomi ringri bedo gi ngima
Mi Jehova Nyasaye duongʼ gi mwanduni
eka dechegi nopongʼ gi cham mogundho
Wuoda, kik icha kum mar Jehova Nyasaye
nimar Jehova Nyasaye kumo jogo mohero
En jahawi ngʼatno moyudo rieko,
nimar en gohala moloyo fedha
Ober moloyo kite ma nengogi tek;
Ngima kuom ndalo mangʼeny ni e lwete korachwich;
Yorene gin yore mag mor
En yadh ngima ne jogo morwake;
Kuom rieko Jehova Nyasaye nochweyo mise mar piny
kuom ngʼeyo mare ema nopogogo aore gi nembe,
Wuoda, rit ngʼado bura makare kod pogo tiend wach,
Ginibedni ngima maber,
Eka ibiro dhi e yoreni gi kwe
ka inindo, to ok inibed maluor,
Kik ibed giluoro mar masira ma ditimreni apoya nono
nimar Jehova Nyasaye ema nomi ibed jachir
Kik iwe timo maber ni jogo mowinjorego,
Ka inyalo konyo wadu kawuono,
Kik ichan hinyo jabathi,
Kik ihangne ngʼato wach maonge gima omiyo,
Kik nyiego maki gi ja-mahundu,
Nimar Jehova Nyasaye ger gi jaricho
Kwongʼ mar Jehova Nyasaye ni e od jaricho,
Ojaro jojaro masungore
Joma riek yudo luor kaka girkeni
